Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for participating in the Doctor Evidence Advanced training. Here is the slide-deck from this week’s presentations.
You also have access to how-to videos and quick-guides which describe the steps necessary to navigate the DOC Data platform. To view this content, please navigate to https://dre.litmos.com?C=483766 and create an account if you do not already have one. (Your email is your user name, but you will need to create a password.)
Please take a moment to browse the DRE publications, which will give you an idea of the breadth of our work and the capabilities of our services: http://drevidence.com/publications/.
Please don’t hesitate to contact us at sanofi.support@doctorevidence.com if you need support in using the system, or would like additional training.
Finally, any feedback you have about how to improve the trainings would be most helpful. Please take a few minutes to answer this brief survey.
Sincerely,
Nancy Morgan Director of Learning and Development Doctor Evidence 847.507.1451
